summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Republican Street, from Fairview Avenue to Minor Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 701 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
